attribute-definition.display-name: ESW List Of Countries Where Product Is Restricted
attribute-definition.description: Product is restricted and not sellable in the mentioned countries. (Enter ISO Codes)

attribute-definition.display-name: ESW List Of Countries Where Product Is Not Returnable
